alert.note: Alert for Cook (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Cook, northwestern Lowndes and north central Brooks Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Adel, moving west at 10 mph. Additional storms were developing near the Lowndes, Cook County line and also moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Adel, Valdosta, Hahira, Sparks, Morven, Cecil, Cook Co A/P, Barney, I-75 At Exit 29, Greggs and Pine Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
